name: Security Assessment Template
description: Comprehensive security assessment template for evaluating system security, risks, vulnerabilities, and compliance
author: Document Writer Extension

variables.name: title
variables.placeholder: e.g., Security Assessment for Enterprise System Infrastructure

variables.name: author
variables.description: Security auditor or assessment team lead
variables.placeholder: e.g., John Smith, CISSP, Security Team Lead

variables.name: date
variables.description: Date the security assessment was conducted
variables.placeholder: Current date will be used if not specified

variables.name: organization
variables.placeholder: e.g., ACME Corporation

variables.name: assessmentScope
variables.description: Scope and boundaries of the security assessment
variables.placeholder: Define systems, networks, applications, and processes included in the assessment

variables.name: methodology
variables.placeholder: e.g., NIST Cybersecurity Framework, ISO 27001, OWASP methodology

variables.name: executiveSummary
variables.placeholder: Brief overview of key findings, overall risk level, and critical recommendations

variables.name: overallRiskLevel
variables.description: Overall risk rating for the organization
variables.placeholder: e.g., High, Medium, Low

variables.name: systemArchitecture
variables.description: Overview of system architecture and components
variables.placeholder: Description of network topology, critical systems, data flows, and infrastructure components

variables.name: threatModel
variables.placeholder: Identified threat actors, attack vectors, and threat scenarios relevant to the organization

variables.name: vulnerabilityAssessment
variables.placeholder: Technical vulnerabilities found in systems, applications, and infrastructure

variables.name: riskMatrix
variables.placeholder: Structured analysis of identified risks with likelihood and impact ratings

variables.name: securityControls
variables.placeholder: Assessment of preventive, detective, and corrective controls currently in place

variables.name: accessControls
variables.description: Access control and identity management evaluation
variables.placeholder: Analysis of user access management, authentication, and authorization mechanisms

variables.name: networkSecurity
variables.placeholder: Evaluation of firewalls, network segmentation, monitoring, and intrusion detection

variables.name: dataProtection
variables.placeholder: Review of data classification, encryption at rest and in transit, and data handling practices

variables.name: gdprCompliance
variables.placeholder: Evaluation of data privacy controls, consent management, and GDPR requirements compliance

variables.name: soc2Compliance
variables.placeholder: Assessment against SOC 2 Type II trust service criteria

variables.name: iso27001Compliance
variables.placeholder: Evaluation against ISO 27001 information security management controls

variables.name: mitigationStrategies
variables.description: Recommended mitigation strategies and remediation actions
variables.placeholder: Prioritized recommendations for addressing identified vulnerabilities and risks

variables.name: immediateActions
variables.description: Immediate actions required for critical findings
variables.placeholder: Urgent remediation steps that should be implemented within 30 days

variables.name: shortTermActions
variables.placeholder: Important security improvements to be completed within 3 months

variables.name: longTermActions
variables.placeholder: Strategic security enhancements and program improvements

variables.name: incidentResponsePlan
variables.placeholder: Evaluation of incident response capabilities and recommended improvements

variables.name: securityMonitoring
variables.placeholder: Recommended security metrics, monitoring tools, and performance indicators

variables.name: toolsUsed
variables.description: Security assessment tools and techniques used
variables.placeholder: List of vulnerability scanners, penetration testing tools, and assessment methodologies

variables.name: testingResults
variables.description: Detailed testing results and technical findings
variables.placeholder: Technical details of vulnerability scans, penetration tests, and security assessments

variables.name: complianceChecklist
variables.placeholder: Detailed checklist of regulatory and framework requirements with current status

variables.name: estimatedCost
variables.description: Estimated cost for implementing all recommendations
variables.placeholder: e.g., 250000 (will be formatted as currency)

variables.name: riskReduction
variables.description: Expected risk reduction percentage after implementation
variables.placeholder: e.g., 0.75 (will be formatted as 75%)

variables.name: nextAssessmentDate
variables.description: Recommended date for next security assessment
variables.placeholder: Typically 12 months from current assessment date

variables.name: assessmentTeam
variables.description: Security assessment team members and credentials
variables.placeholder: List of team members, roles, and relevant certifications

sections.name: Title Page
sections.description: Cover page with assessment title, organization, assessor, and date

sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: High-level overview of assessment scope, key findings, and risk level

sections.name: Assessment Scope and Methodology
sections.description: Detailed scope boundaries and assessment methodology used

sections.name: System Architecture Overview
sections.description: Architecture diagrams and system component descriptions

sections.name: Risk Analysis
sections.description: Risk identification matrix, threat modeling, and vulnerability assessment

sections.name: Security Controls Evaluation
sections.description: Assessment of access controls, network security, and data protection

sections.name: Compliance Assessment
sections.description: GDPR, SOC2, ISO27001, and other regulatory compliance evaluation

sections.name: Implementation Timeline and Priorities
sections.description: Immediate, short-term, and long-term action plans

sections.name: Compliance Checklist
sections.description: Detailed compliance checklist with current status

sections.name: Incident Response Planning
sections.description: Incident response capabilities assessment and recommendations

sections.name: Security Monitoring and Metrics
sections.description: Security monitoring framework and key performance indicators

sections.name: Appendices
sections.description: Tools used, detailed findings, technical test results, and supporting documentation

styling.spacing: professional with consistent margins and security assessment formatting

usageInstructions: Complete all required fields before generating the security assessment report
Risk levels should be categorized as Critical, High, Medium, or Low
Include specific technical details in vulnerability and testing results sections
Compliance assessments should reference specific regulatory requirements
Cost estimates should be realistic and based on market rates for security implementations
Risk reduction percentages should be entered as decimals (e.g., 0.75 for 75%)
Use professional security terminology and industry-standard risk classifications
Include actionable recommendations with clear implementation timelines
Reference specific security frameworks and standards used in the assessment
Ensure all findings are substantiated with technical evidence and business impact analysis
riskCategories: Critical - Immediate action required, severe business impact
High - Action required within 30 days, significant impact
Medium - Action required within 90 days, moderate impact
Low - Monitor and address as resources permit, minimal impact
